amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding for the International Organization for Migration's activities in the Western Hemisphere.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 225 (Roll no. 310).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 225 (Roll no. 310).
